creditline: Gift of the Estate of Marion Nelson
description: short, splayed foot; long spout; cream underglaze with green, black, orange, blue, brown, purple and gilt Deco design at top and handle; white interior
markings: \'*FRAUNFELTER*/CHINA [inside a double oval]\' and \'OHIO [inside a diamond surrounded by double oval]\', in green, on bottom; \'ROYAL-ROCHESTER/HAND-DECORATED/Royalite/ELECTRIC CHINAWARE\', in yellow, inside a purple cartouche, on bottom; \'2638\', in brown, on bottom
object_name: Creamer, from a three-piece coffee service
title: Creamer, from a three-piece coffee service
